LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Store Locator plugin will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.HeaderMenuIntegration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose where to show the Store Locator in the main menu. This will provide menu with all available shops. Choose "None" if you do not want to show the Store Locator in the menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.HomePageIntegration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose where to show the Store Locator map on the Home page. It will include only the shops that have checked the "Show On Home Page" setting. Choose "None" if you do not want to show the Store Locator on this page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.ContactUsPageIntegration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose where to show the Store Locator map on the Contact Us page. Choose "None" if you do not want to show the Store Locator on this page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.UnitsSystem.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the default measure units system (kilometers or miles).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.DefaultDistanceRadius.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the default distance radius that will be pre-filled in the search input.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.GoogleApiKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: You can read more about this key in our documentation. https://www.nop-templates.com/store-locator-plugin-for-nopcommerce-documentation#settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.ManuallySetMapBounds
LocaleResource.Value: Manually Set Map Bounds (initial map position)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.ManuallySetMapBounds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose to manually set the map bounds. If checked you will be able to enter the Latitude and Longitude of the center of the map and the exact Zoom level.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.Latitude.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the latitude of the center of the map

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.Longitude.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the longitude of the center of the map

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.MapZoomLevel.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The zoom level for the map. It will be exactly as specified only if Manually Set Map Bounds is checked otherwise the map will automatically extend the bounds to fit all markers and the zoom level might be overridden.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.DefaultShopImageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the default shop image to be shown when the shop does not have images.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.AllShopsPageImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the shops image size for the All Shop page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.ShopDetailsPageImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the shops image size for the Shop Details page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Settings.CustomMapStyles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert custom styles for the Google Maps in JSON format.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.StoreLocator.Fields.ShopName.IsRequired
LocaleResource.Value: The shop must have a name

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.IsVisible.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the shop will be visible in the public site.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the name of your shop

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Latitude.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the latitude of your shop

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Longitude.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the longitude of your shop

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.ShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The short description is shown on the all shops page and also in the marker on the map.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.FullDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The full description is shown on the shop page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.ShowOnHomeContactUsPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show On Home / Contact Us Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.ShowOnHomeContactUsPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the setting to show the store on the home page / contact us map.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Tags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Shop tags are keywords that this shop can also be identified by. Enter a comma separated list of the tags to be associated with this shop.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This determines the order in which your shops are shown

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.MetaTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the Meta Title for this shop

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.MetaDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the Meta Description for this shop

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.MetaKeywords.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the Meta Keywords for this shop separated by commas

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Seo.PutStoreOnMap
LocaleResource.Value: Search by address or click on the map to place the marker exactly where you want it or manually enter coordinates.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Shop first.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Admin.Shop.Stores.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Shop, before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.GeoLocationNotSupported
LocaleResource.Value: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.AllShops.PageMetaDescription
LocaleResource.Value: All shops that offer our products

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.NoShops
LocaleResource.Value: We don't have any shops yet.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.NoShopsAfterFiltering
LocaleResource.Value: There are no shops that match this search criteria.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.UseMyLocation.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: (maybe you will be asked for confirmation by the browser)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.StoreLocator.Public.SortMethod.SearchForShopInRadius
LocaleResource.Value: Search for shops in radius of
